codeSystems.name: AssessmentSideValueSet
codeSystems.title: 評估側別選項
codeSystems.description: ARAT評估時選擇左側或右側的選項
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ARATQuestionnaireRes: ARAT上肢功能評估問卷回覆

codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: QuestionnaireItemType
codeSystems.title: QuestionnaireItemType
codeSystems.description: Distinguishes groups from questions and display text and indicates data type for questions.

codeSystems.name: Jurisdiction ValueSet
codeSystems.title: Jurisdiction
codeSystems.description:
This value set defines a base set of codes for country, country subdivision and region    for indicating where a resource is intended to be used.   
   
   Note: The codes for countries and country subdivisions are taken from    [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html)    while the codes for "supra-national" regions are from    [UN Standard country or area codes for statistical use (M49)](http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm).

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ARATQuestionnaireRes: ARAT上肢功能評估問卷回覆

codeSystems.name: LinkType
codeSystems.title: LinkType
codeSystems.description: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

codeSystems.name: Marital Status Codes
codeSystems.title: MaritalStatus
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationship
codeSystems.title: Patient Contact Relationship
codeSystems.description: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

codeSystems.name: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.title: PublicationStatus
codeSystems.description: The lifecycle status of an artifact.

codeSystems.name: QuestionnaireAnswerCodes
codeSystems.title: Questionnaire Answer Codes
codeSystems.description: Example list of codes for answers to questions. (Not complete or necessarily appropriate.)
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ARATQuestionnaireRes: ARAT上肢功能評估問卷回覆

codeSystems.name: QuestionnaireResponseStatus
codeSystems.title: QuestionnaireResponseStatus
codeSystems.description: Lifecycle status of the questionnaire response.
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-ARATQuestionnaireRes: ARAT上肢功能評估問卷回覆

codeSystems.name: EnableWhenBehavior
codeSystems.title: EnableWhenBehavior
codeSystems.description: Controls how multiple enableWhen values are interpreted -  whether all or any must be true.

codeSystems.name: QuestionnaireItemOperator
codeSystems.title: QuestionnaireItemOperator
codeSystems.description: The criteria by which a question is enabled.

codeSystems.name: QuestionnaireQuestionCodes
codeSystems.title: Questionnaire Question Codes
codeSystems.description: Example list of codes for questions and groups of questions. (Not necessarily complete or appropriate.)

codeSystems.name: ResourceType
codeSystems.title: ResourceType
codeSystems.description: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.
